title: DbRESTFul CRI Definition
description: Define a configured redis invocation（CRI） code.

key.description: The redis key to operate. it is optional, if the key specified in the query string of HttpContext.Request.

resultType.description: Decides the type of result to return.

method.description: Indicates which operation method will be invoked, please refer to the spec for more details.

param.description: The data to operate into Redis.
